l4/cxx/ref_ptr

00020 #pragma once
00021 
00022 namespace cxx {
00023 
00024 template< typename T >
00025 struct Default_ref_counter
00026 {
00027   void h_drop_ref(T *p) throw()
00028   {
00029     if (p->remove_ref() == 0)
00030       delete p;
00031   }
00032 
00033   void h_take_ref(T *p) throw()
00034   {
00035     p->add_ref();
00036   }
00037 };
00038 
00039 struct Ref_ptr_base
00040 {
00041   enum Default_value
00042   { Nil = 0 };
00043 };
00044 
00045 template<typename T, template< typename X > class CNT = Default_ref_counter>
00046 class Weak_ptr;
00047 
00048 template <
00049   typename T = void,
00050   template< typename X > class CNT = Default_ref_counter
00051 >
00052 class Ref_ptr : public Ref_ptr_base, private CNT<T>
00053 {
00054 private:
00055   struct Null_type;
00056   typedef Weak_ptr<T, CNT> Wp;
00057 
00058 public:
00059   Ref_ptr() throw() : _p(0) {}
00060 
00061   Ref_ptr(Ref_ptr_base::Default_value v) : _p((T*)v) {}
00062 
00063   Ref_ptr(Wp const &o) throw() : _p(o.ptr())
00064   { __take_ref(); }
00065 
00066   explicit Ref_ptr(T *o) throw() : _p(o)
00067   { __take_ref(); }
00068 
00071   Ref_ptr(T *o, bool) throw() : _p(o) {}
00072 
00073   T *get() const throw()
00074   {
00075     return _p;
00076   }
00077 
00078   T *ptr() const throw()
00079   {
00080     return _p;
00081   }
00082 
00083   T *release() throw()
00084   {
00085     T *p = _p;
00086     _p = 0;
00087     return p;
00088   }
00089 
00090   ~Ref_ptr() throw()
00091   { __drop_ref(); }
00092 
00093   template<typename OT>
00094   Ref_ptr(Ref_ptr<OT, CNT> const &o) throw()
00095   {
00096     _p = o.ptr();
00097     __take_ref();
00098   }
00099 
00100   Ref_ptr(Ref_ptr<T> const &o) throw()
00101   {
00102     _p = o._p;
00103     __take_ref();
00104   }
00105 
00106   template< typename OT >
00107   void operator = (Ref_ptr<OT> const &o) throw()
00108   {
00109     __drop_ref();
00110     _p = o.ptr();
00111     __take_ref();
00112   }
00113 
00114   void operator = (Ref_ptr<T> const &o) throw()
00115   {
00116     if (&o == this)
00117       return;
00118 
00119     __drop_ref();
00120     _p = o._p;
00121     __take_ref();
00122   }
00123 
00124   void operator = (T *o) throw()
00125   {
00126     __drop_ref();
00127     _p = o;
00128     __take_ref();
00129   }
00130 
00131   T *operator -> () const throw ()
00132   { return _p; }
00133 
00134   operator Null_type const * () const throw()
00135   { return reinterpret_cast<Null_type const*>(_p); }
00136 
00137 private:
00138   void __drop_ref() throw()
00139   {
00140     if (_p)
00141       this->h_drop_ref(_p);
00142   }
00143 
00144   void __take_ref() throw()
00145   {
00146     if (_p)
00147       this->h_take_ref(_p);
00148   }
00149 
00150   T *_p;
00151 };
00152 
00153 
00154 template<typename T, template< typename X > class CNT>
00155 class Weak_ptr
00156 {
00157 private:
00158   struct Null_type;
00159   typedef Ref_ptr<T, CNT> Rp;
00160 
00161 public:
00162   Weak_ptr() throw() {}
00163   Weak_ptr(Rp const &o) throw() : _p(o.ptr()) {}
00164   explicit Weak_ptr(T *o) throw() : _p(o) {}
00165 
00166   T *get() const throw() { return _p; }
00167   T *ptr() const throw() { return _p; }
00168 
00169   T *operator -> () const throw () { return _p; }
00170   operator Null_type const * () const throw()
00171   { return reinterpret_cast<Null_type const*>(_p); }
00172 
00173 private:
00174   T *_p;
00175 };
00176 
00177 template<typename OT, typename T> inline
00178 Ref_ptr<OT> ref_ptr_static_cast(Ref_ptr<T> const &o)
00179 { return ref_ptr(static_cast<OT*>(o.ptr())); }
00180 
00181 template< typename T >
00182 inline Ref_ptr<T> ref_ptr(T *t)
00183 { return Ref_ptr<T>(t); }
00184 
00185 template< typename T >
00186 inline Weak_ptr<T> weak_ptr(T *t)
00187 { return Weak_ptr<T>(t); }
00188 
00189 
00190 class Ref_obj
00191 {
00192 private:
00193   mutable int _ref_cnt;
00194 
00195 public:
00196   Ref_obj() : _ref_cnt(0)  {}
00197   void add_ref() const throw() { ++_ref_cnt; }
00198   int remove_ref() const throw() { return --_ref_cnt; }
00199 };
00200 
00201 }
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
